Title: A grand parade to celebrate the founding of the People's Republic of China
Publisher: Shanghai Xushengji yinshuachang (上海徐胜记印刷厂)
Notes: The parade is a mix of traditional and modern elements: costumed drum dancers, stilt-walkers, a lion and a dragon, workers in overalls with red flags and portraits of Mao Zedong and Zhu De. It takes place in People's Park in the center of Shanghai, built on the site of the old racecourse.
Theme: Shanghai, Poster City1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of China
